advisories: Frequent/Intense Alcohol, Tobacco, or Drug Use or References

editorialNotes.standard: This fun brain-bender takes the winning WordBrain formula to another level. Trace adjoining tiles to spell words long and short, each organized into categories that point your gray cells in the right direction. But you’ll have to spell carefully, because the order of the letters you choose determines whether you can clear the board. It’s a zippy spin on time-tested gameplay—and a perfect fit for puzzle fans.

ios.subtitle: Word puzzle game for all ages

editorialNotes.standard: A funky ’70s aesthetic, wild cards that thwart easy wins – we’ve rarely seen a word game with so much style.
